Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation when 5 or more "Special
Pose" Category allies are on the team*
- {passiveImg:once}{passiveImg:forever}Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 150%{passiveImg:up_g}
- {passiveImg:once}{passiveImg:forever}Launches an additional Super Attack
- {passiveImg:once}All allies' ATK & DEF 25%{passiveImg:up_g} for 3 turn(s) (self excluded)
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 150%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Special Pose"
Category characters*
- Guards all attacks
- Attacks are effective against all Types
*Per "Special Pose" Category ally on the team*
- Damage reduction rate 7%{passiveImg:up_g} before attacking (up to 35%)
- Chance of performing a critical hit 7%{passiveImg:up_g} when attacking (up
to 35%)
*With an INT or Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained*
- "Special Pose" Category allies' ATK & DEF 25%{passiveImg:up_g} for 2
turn(s) (self excluded)
*With a Type Ki Sphere obtained (INT excluded)*
- ATK & DEF 50%{passiveImg:up_g}

5520.superDescription:
Greatly raises DEF for 1 turn, 
causes colossal damage and 
stuns the enemy

SpecialBonus.Description:
50% chance of Super Attack transforming 
and ATK being greatly raised for 1 turn! 
Power will increase more if Super Attack level reaches 20!

5521.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK and 
causes colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description:
50% chance of Super Attack transforming 
and DEF being greatly raised for the rest of battle! 
Power will increase more if Super Attack level reaches 20!
Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Special Fighting Pose
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when all allies are 
"Ginyu Force" Category characters starting from 
the 3rd turn from the character's entry turn, 
or when all allies are "Special Pose" Category 
characters starting from the 5th turn from 
the character's entry turn (once only)
